name: Larry Chidi
body:
Tau Global Academy has been one of the big push I needed to get in the real world space. I had an immense learning that was really different from the self learning I started with. The learning was fun and there were some internship job opportunities that were presented to us. I got my first gig immediately after the program. 
 Thank you Tau Global Academy for that push I needed.

name: Shukel Taiwo
body: Their tutors are made for their job, very dedicated. Students who have completed their session are always satisfied, and able to communicate in the foreign language learnt as per their level. Clients are respected, valued and always get a run for their time and money.... Tau Global Academy welcomes you anytime!!!

name: Kayode Awosetan
body: Tau Global Academy is a place to be, it has good ambience for learning, modern facilities which aid the learning of IELTS, qualified and experienced teachers who are patient enough to explain to details, within a short period of time, I am able to master the IELTS. I really enjoyed my study at the Centre. I can recommend this centre to anyone who really wants to pass their IELTS test.

name: Nwosu Ugochukwu
body: A very comfortable place for sound ICT knowledge importation, perfect for remote office and mini seminars. very lovely environment
